code: import React from'react';import'./Notifications.css';import{getLatestNotification}from'./utils';import closeIcon from'./close-icon.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Notifications(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Notifications",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{color:'#3a3a3a',fontWeight:'bold',background:'none',border:'none',fontSize:'15px',position:'absolute',right:'3px',top:'3px',cursor:'pointer',outline:'none'},"aria-label":"Close",onClick:function onClick(e){console.log('Close button has been clicked');},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:closeIcon,alt:"close icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Here is the list of notifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"default",children:"New course available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"urgent",children:"New resume available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"urgent",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:getLatestNotification()}})]})]});};export default Notifications;
